commands.name: az eventgrid partner namespace create
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid partner namespace create --name
                                      --partner-registration-id
                                      --resource-group
                                      [--location]
                                      [--partner-topic-routing-mode {ChannelNameHeader, SourceEventAttribute}]
                                      [--tags]
examples: az eventgrid partner namespace create -g rg1 --name namespaceName1 -l westus2 --partner-registration-id 795c9f2f-6d2d-42ff-a570-42fd3043192c

commands.name: az eventgrid partner namespace delete
examples: az eventgrid partner namespace delete -g rg1 --name partnernamespace1

commands.name: az eventgrid partner namespace list
examples: az eventgrid partner namespace list -g rg1
az eventgrid partner namespace list -g rg1 --odata-query "Contains(name, 'XYZ')"
az eventgrid partner namespace list -g rg1 --odata-query "NOT (name eq 'name1')"

commands.name: az eventgrid partner namespace show
commands.summary: Get the details of a partner namespace.
examples: az eventgrid partner namespace show -g rg1 -n partnernamespace1
